# PHPickerConfigurationSelection

**Enumeration**

Options that represent differing selection behavior.

## Declaration

```swift
enum PHPickerConfigurationSelection
```

## Overview

This enumeration defines the possible values of the photo picker configuration ([doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/PhotosUI/PHPickerConfiguration-swift.struct]) property [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/PhotosUI/PHPickerConfiguration-swift.struct/selection-swift.property].

## Selection methods

- **PHPickerConfigurationSelection.default**: An option that provides selected photos to the app in the default order after the user confirms the selection.
- **PHPickerConfigurationSelection.ordered**: An option that provides selected photos to the app in the chosen order after the user confirms the selection.
- **PHPickerConfigurationSelection.continuous**: An option that provides the app a person’s selection immediately.
- **PHPickerConfigurationSelection.continuousAndOrdered**: An option that provides the app a person’s selection immediately and displays selected photos with a numbered badge.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
